description:
MVVM-Sidekick https://github.com/waynebaby/MVVM-Sidekick/
      =============
      MVVM密友 https://github.com/waynebaby/MVVM-Sidekick/
      ===================


      A Modern light-weight MVVM framework based on RX and TPL await

      轻量级MVVM框架,基于RX与 await等新技术
releaseNotes:
-----


      1.3.0.3
      Fix an exception happend with Rx 2.2.5 running on Windows phone 8.1 dev preview

      1.3.0.1
      Fix Ser/Deser Bug with bindable base.

      1.2.3.2
      Fix Lost [DataContract]  attribute on disposing Group

      1.2.3.1
      Change default value of ViewModelBase(of TVM).IsDisposingWhenUnloadRequired, it should be false in most cases.

      1.2.3.0
      fixed bug: await vm.StageManager.Show()  cannot complete in WPF MVVMWindow

      1.2.2.8
      fixed bug: await vm.StageManager.Show()  cannot complete in MVVMPage

      1.2.2.6
      Fixed a .ListenToIsUIBusy() Command Canexecute Refresh bug.

      1.2.2.5
      Add a new exption throw point, that reports "You havn't mapped a VM to a View cause null reference" kinda bug.
      Add core lib code into nupkg. you can find MVVMSidekick.zip in src folder. Happy debugging!

      1.2.2.4
      Fixed "ListenToUIBusy"  method logic.

      1.2.2.3
      Bug fix: Fixed ExecuteTask cannot await deadlock.
      Added a lazy load EventRouter to each BindableBase to support Event Routing behaviors.
summary:
https://github.com/waynebaby/MVVM-Sidekick/

      The aim of this project: Using new techs offered by .Net 4.5 and Windows Runtime, design a suitable foundation for new tech environment, based on a cool ViewModelBase and ReactiveCommand.

      目的是集合Reactive Command, Prism 等框架的优点，应对.Net 4.5 和 Windows Runtime带来的变化，为新技术环境量身打造一套以ViewModelBase/ReactiveCommand为核心的基础。



      [微博] [twitter] [Mail]

      [twitter]: http://twitter.com/waynebaby "Waynebaby"

title: MVVM Sidekick Light-weight Framework
